movies.title: Jurassic World Rebirth
movies.description: The next chapter in the Jurassic saga brings humanity back to the brink.

comments.text: Great movie, def recommend!
Loved the dinos, story was solid.
Best Jurassic movie in a while.

movies.title: SuperMan
movies.description: A new DC universe take that mixes epic action, humor and heart.

comments.text: Fun to watch, not perfect but enjoyable.
Action was good, story could be better.

movies.title: Bad Guys
movies.description: The now reformed Bad Guys get dragged into a globe-trotting heist led by a new crew.

comments.text: Really funny and stylish animation.
Kids loved it, I had fun too.

movies.title: Split
movies.description: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with multiple distinct personalities.

comments.text: Super intense, acting was incredible.
Creepy and interesting, ending was wild.
Great psychological thriller, well done.

movies.title: White Chicks
movies.description: Two disgraced FBI agents go deep undercover as two spoiled heiresses.

comments.text: I still laugh every time I watch this.
Classic comedy, never gets old.
watched it again last weekend, still hilarious!

movies.title: Barbie
movies.description: Life in Barbie Land is perfect until a full-on existential crisis shakes everything.

comments.text: Funny, smart and emotional at the same time.
Way deeper than I expected, loved the style.
A unique take on a classic character, highly recommend!

movies.title: It Ends With Us
movies.description: A dramatic love story based on the best-selling novel.

comments.text: Good adaptation, but the book still hits harder.
Emotional but a bit rushed in parts.

movies.title: The Discovery
movies.description: A story about exploring love, loss and what comes after.

comments.text: Interesting idea, pacing was slow though.
Not for everyone, but I liked the mood.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: Explorers travel through a wormhole in space in a desperate mission to save humanity.

comments.text: Masterpiece. Music, visuals, story, everything.
I cry at the father-daughter scenes every time.

movies.title: Extraction 2
movies.description: A black ops mercenary attempts a dangerous rescue that uncovers a dark conspiracy.

comments.text: Action scenes were fire, story was ok.
Good for background watching, nothing special.

movies.title: Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must work together to stop a global threat.

comments.text: One of the best superhero team-ups ever.
Huge moments, great fun in the theater.

movies.title: IT
movies.description: A group of kids face an ancient shape-shifting evil that feeds on fear.

comments.text: Actually scary, Pennywise is nightmare fuel.
Loved the kids, great cast and atmosphere.

movies.title: Truth or Dare
movies.description: A simple game of truth or dare turns deadly for a group of friends.

comments.text: Cheesy but fun, perfect with friends.
Not super deep, but entertaining.

movies.title: the litle stranger
movies.description: A country doctor becomes wrapped up in the dark history of a decaying estate.

comments.text: Slow burn gothic vibes, not very scary.
Too slow for me, but well shot.

movies.title: Black Phone2
movies.description: The Grabber torments his former victim and family from beyond the grave.

comments.text: Really tense, I jumped a few times.
Good sequel, creepy atmosphere.

movies.title: Turno nocturno
movies.description: A new nurse faces the terrifying legend of a ghostly nurse in a haunted hospital.

comments.text: Cool premise, some really spooky scenes.
Good atmosphere but some parts dragged.

movies.title: The Forest
movies.description: A woman searches Japan's infamous Suicide Forest for her missing sister.

comments.text: Creepy setting, I liked the mystery.
Had potential, ending was okay.

movies.title: The conjuring 2
movies.description: Ed and Lorraine Warren investigate a terrifying haunting in north London.

comments.text: One of the scariest in the series for me.
Great jumpscares, strong performances.

movies.title: Mirrors 2
movies.description: A night watchman is haunted by deadly visions in the mirrors of a department store.

comments.text: Some cool ideas but not very scary.
Watchable once, nothing special.

movies.title: One Battle After Another
movies.description: A former revolutionary and his daughter face the consequences of his past.

comments.text: Interesting idea but kind of messy.
Cast did a good job even if story was weak.

movies.title: Countdown
movies.description: A mysterious app counts down to its users' deaths, turning their lives into a race against time.

comments.text: Cool concept, decent execution.
Fun if you don't think too hard about the logic.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: A marine on Pandora becomes torn between following orders and protecting his new home.

comments.text: Visuals are insane, still holds up.
Best 3D experience I've had in a cinema.

movies.title: Sovereign
movies.description: A father and son who follow a radical belief system face the fallout after a violent confrontation.

comments.text: Tense and thought-provoking, really stuck with me.
Great acting and a heavy story.
